title: Strategies to Enhance Elementary Physical Education Effectiveness Through Gamification

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: A course on designing and applying gamification in smartphone-based microlearning environments.

learning_goals: Explain the principles of designing physical education classes utilizing gamification elements
Plan three or more gamification activities applicable in mobile environments
Propose strategies to enhance self-efficacy in elementary school physical education

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
